title: Macedonian Fonts (Cyrillic)
description:
Lots of Fonts for Macedonian Cyrillic.

Unrar, copy all fonts (not the whole Folder),then paste into your Font Folder in Control Panel and you are done.

I guess you all know how to add/manage fonts in text,but just in case someone dont know how to ,il spare you the posts and questions! :D
